thread.section_title: Pelican Water Systems Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Pelican Water Systems | pelicanwater.com
thread.title: phyllis
thread.title_full: Pelican Water Systems reviewed by phyllis

author: phyllis
title: phyllis
text: Was pleased with my whole house water filter. Box contained everything necessary, including instructions. Also, Pelican is very helpful in answering any related questions or any questions that pop up. However, when I bought the last filter from Pelican, Pelican recommended a plumber to install it. That plumber would not do the work this time, so I had to hunt for a plumber to do the work.
